sentences.sContent: Could you do me a favour and tell Kelly I can’t make it?

sentences.sContent: Paul, can I ask you a favor ?
I owed him a favour so I couldn’t say no.

sentences.sContent: Do yourself a favour and make sure you get some time to yourself.
sentences.sCn: 对自己好些，一定要留点时间给自己。
